title: Form of registration in beneficiary form
context: [ยง539-5] Form of registration in beneficiary form. Registration in beneficiary form may be shown by the words &ldquo;transfer on death&rdquo; or the abbreviation &ldquo;TOD&rdquo;, or by the words &ldquo;pay on death&rdquo; or the abbreviation &ldquo;POD&rdquo;, after the name of the registered owner and before the name of a beneficiary. [L 1998, c 63, pt of ยง1]
